thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com | 10 of 581
thread.title: Glenda

author: Glenda
title: Glenda
text: Found the customer service exceptional. Only complaint is when I arrived this past Sunday to move things into my 5' x 10' indoor unit.... there was a water leak right outside the door from a heater unit. I am using the indoor unit specifically because what I am storing needs to stay dry. I have not been able to move in yet. The manager assured me there was a work order requested... have not heard yet if it is repaired. I am concerned about that.
